achievements.description: Acquire diamonds

achievements.description: Distract Piglins with gold

achievements.description: Use a compass on a Lodestone

achievements.description: Obtain a Wither Skeleton's skull

achievements.name: Into Fire
achievements.description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod

achievements.description: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum

achievements.name: Feels Like Home
achievements.description: Take a Strider for a loooong ride on a lava lake in the Overworld

achievements.name: Hot Tourist Destinations
achievements.description: Explore all Nether biomes

achievements.name: Withering Heights
achievements.description: Summon the Wither

achievements.description: Brew a potion

achievements.description: Construct and place a beacon

achievements.name: A Furious Cocktail
achievements.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

achievements.name: Beaconator
achievements.description: Bring a beacon to full power

achievements.name: How Did We Get Here?
achievements.description: Have every effect applied at the same time

achievements.name: The End?
achievements.description: Or the beginning?

achievements.name: Free the End
achievements.description: Good luck

achievements.name: The Next Generation
achievements.description: Hold the Dragon Egg

achievements.name: Remote Getaway
achievements.description: Escape the island

achievements.name: The End... Again...
achievements.description: Respawn the Ender Dragon

achievements.name: You Need a Mint
achievements.description: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle

achievements.name: The City at the End of the Game
achievements.description: Go on in, what could happen?

achievements.name: Sky's the Limit
achievements.description: Find elytra

achievements.name: Great View From Up Here
achievements.description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker

achievements.name: Voluntary Exile
achievements.description: Kill a raid captain. Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...

achievements.name: Is It a Bird?
achievements.description: Look at a parrot through a spyglass

achievements.name: Monster Hunter
achievements.description: Kill any hostile monster

achievements.name: What a Deal!
achievements.description: Successfully trade with a villager

achievements.description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall

achievements.name: Ol' Betsy
achievements.description: Shoot a crossbow

achievements.name: Surge Protector
achievements.description: Protect a villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire

achievements.name: Caves & Cliffs
achievements.description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive

achievements.name: Sneak 100
achievements.description: Sneak near a Sculk Sensor or Warden to prevent it from detecting you

achievements.name: Sweet Dreams
achievements.description: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point

achievements.name: Hero of the Village
achievements.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid

achievements.name: Is It a Balloon?
achievements.description: Look at a ghast through a spyglass

achievements.name: A Throwaway Joke
achievements.description: Throw a trident at something. Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.

achievements.name: It Spreads
achievements.description: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst

achievements.name: Take Aim
achievements.description: Shoot something with an arrow

achievements.name: Monsters Hunted
achievements.description: Kill one of every hostile monster

achievements.name: Postmortal
achievements.description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

achievements.name: Hired Help
achievements.description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village

achievements.name: Star Trader
achievements.description: Trade with a Villager at the build height limit

achievements.name: Two Birds, One Arrow
achievements.description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow

achievements.name: Who's the Pillager Now?
achievements.description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

achievements.name: Arbalistic
achievements.description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot

achievements.name: Adventuring Time
achievements.description: Discover every biome

achievements.name: Sound of Music
achievements.description: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a Jukebox

achievements.name: Light as a Rabbit
achievements.description: Walk on powder snow...without sinking in it

achievements.name: Is It a Plane?
achievements.description: Look at the Ender Dragon through a spyglass

achievements.name: Very Very Frightening
achievements.description: Strike a Villager with lightning

achievements.name: Sniper Duel
achievements.description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away

achievements.description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away

achievements.description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees

achievements.name: The Parrots and the Bats
achievements.description: Breed two animals together

achievements.name: You've Got a Friend in Me
achievements.description: Have an Allay deliver items to you

achievements.name: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
achievements.description: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat

achievements.name: Glow and Behold!
achievements.description: Make the text of a sign glow

achievements.name: Fishy Business
achievements.description: Catch a fish

achievements.name: Total Beelocation
achievements.description: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch

achievements.name: Bukkit Bukkit
achievements.description: Catch a Tadpole in a Bucket

achievements.name: A Seedy Place
achievements.description: Plant a seed and watch it grow

achievements.name: Wax On
achievements.description: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!

achievements.name: Two by Two
achievements.description: Breed all the animals!

achievements.name: Birthday Song
achievements.description: Have an Allay drop a Cake at a Note Block

achievements.name: A Complete Catalogue
achievements.description: Tame all cat variants!

achievements.name: Tactical Fishing
achievements.description: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!

achievements.name: When the Squad Hops into Town
achievements.description: Get each Frog variant on a Lead

achievements.name: A Balanced Diet
achievements.description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you

achievements.name: Serious Dedication
achievements.description: Use a Netherite Ingot to upgrade a hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices

achievements.name: Wax Off
achievements.description: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!

achievements.name: The Cutest Predator
achievements.description: Catch an axolotl in a bucket

achievements.name: With Our Powers Combined!
achievements.description: Have all Froglights in your inventory

achievements.name: The Healing Power of Friendship!
